description: Join Blue Badge Guide Sue Grayson Ford to discover the treasures inside Enfield’s medieval parish church, and hear the stories behind many other listed buildings before visiting Enfield Chase and the New River, dating from 1613.

events.name: Church Bell Ringing
events.notes: Visit the bell ringers' room in the 12th century tower for a demonstration of the ancient art of bell ringing on the bells of St Andrew's Church, Market Place, Enfield EN2 6LNVisitors can arrive at any time during the opening hours.There may be queues at busy times.

factsheet.heading: Tour information
paragraphs: Join Blue Badge Guide Sue Grayson Ford to discover the treasures inside Enfield’s medieval parish church, and hear the stories behind many other listed buildings before visiting Enfield Chase (the remnants of the royal hunting grounds), and the New River, dating from 1613.

images.title: Enfield Town Library, by Shepheard, Eptein & Hunter, opened 2010 and winner of 'Best Built Project’ at the January 2011 London Planning Awards

images.description: courtesy of Enfield local history archive
images.title: St Andrew's, Enfield Town Parish Church

travel_info: Nearest train: Enfield Chase, Enfield Town

name: Medieval to Millennial
